data.text: @HugoThompsonEco @celinegounder @TheAtlantic @edyong209 The study showed an early PCR negative conversion rate in patients treated with ivermectin, but no other improvements in terms of duration of symptoms or length of illness. So while it may improve viral clearance from the nose/throat, it did not reduce symptoms or illness length

@Sandra49932387 @celinegounder @TheAtlantic @edyong209 My understanding can Ivermectin help in early treatment of Covid, not when someone has been hospitalised with a severe late stage infection

https://t.co/KFA622gxIi

@HugoThompsonEco @celinegounder @TheAtlantic @edyong209 This paper does not show what you think it does.All patients treated with remdesivir are hospitalized.Most patients treated with ivermectin were not hospitalized.There are no  control for hospitalization rates, or measures of COVID illness severity. Can’t say it’s more effective
